snippet.title: Tapper World Tour Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it now on the App Store...

iPhone: http://bit.ly/eZQhSJ
iPad: http://bit.ly/gjQ2U6

Tapper World Tour for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad is a modern reinterpretation of the classic arcade game Root Beer Tapper released in 1983 by Bally Midway. Players are put in the shoes of a bartender with the goal of serving beer and collecting empty mugs and tips from a very demanding group of patrons. In TWT, players wander to different watering holes around the globe to create authentic, local libations. - www.TapperWorldTour.com
